description: Try our easy to follow Kit Kat Celebration Cheesecake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: No-bake cheesecake,Seafood free,Egg free,Spring,No-bake desserts,Sesame free,Baking,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,High protein,Peanut free
name: Kit Kat Celebration Cheesecake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 125g Mcvitie's Digestives Biscuits Plain Original, crushed
500g Philadelphia Cream Cheese Block, softened, at room temperature
150g Nestle bakers choice dark choc melts, melted
680g Nestle Kit Kat bars, broken into fingers

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 22cm round springform pan. Line base and side with baking paper, extending paper 1cm above the edge.

Place biscuits in a food processor and process until they resemble fine breadcrumbs. Add butter and process until combined. Using back of a metal spoon, press mixture over base of pan to compact. Refrigerate until required.
Meanwhile, place 2 tbs boiling water in a small bowl and sprinkle over gelatine, stirring until dissolved. Set aside to cool.

Using an electric mixer, beat cream cheese and condensed milk until smooth and combined. Beat in gelatine mixture until just combined. Pour mixture over biscuit base, then drizzle with chocolate and use a knife to swirl through the cream cheese mixture. Refrigerate for 3 hours or until set.
Transfer cheesecake to a platter. Using 3 Kit Kat bars, arrange fingers around sides of cheesecake. Wrap with a ribbon to decorate.
Finely chop remaining Kit Kat fingers and sprinkle over top of cheesecake. Serve topped with strawberries.
